Describe your issue: Hi there - My internet connection is strong so I'm not sure why in the status bar it says "saving pause" and I can't download. When I click on the link to view it rather than download, it's an older version of the presentation. I go into the File drop down and try to save from there, but that doesn't work either. Please help - I don't want to lose all of my work! Thank you.

Describe your issue: just inquiring is when my trail is over will I lose the content I've worked on till now

What type of problem?: Other Describe your problem: Hello, for a few days now, the page I am working on has been trying to disconnect, while my network is functioning well. Suddenly, I lose the data that I modify and I cannot download my work. the banner "your last modifications have not been saved ..." appears and I cannot save my work. Can you help me please?
